FAIL_TO_PASS: when program has subcommands then has automatic help command
when program has command then appears in help
when add no visible command with heading then heading does not appear
when program has command with optional arg then appears in help
when add two commands with helpGroup then help contains group
when add custom help command then custom help command
when command sets hidden then not displayed in helpInformation
when .helpCommand(name) then help command in group
when command sets deprecated noHelp then not displayed in helpInformation
when .helpCommand(true) then help command in group
when "program help" then program
when executable subcommand and no command specified then throw CommanderError
when command with custom helpGroup then helpGroup wins
when command has aliases then only first appears in help
when addCommand with hidden:true then not displayed in helpInformation
when default command and "program help" then program
when add two commands then help contains group with two commands
when no command specified and executable then display help
when add one command then help contains group
when implicit help command then help command not affected
